若罔顧語言傳統而任由己意，是暴政之始、暴政之用。To matter有重要之義，如網路劍橋辭典釋之云：...


You don't seem to get it.
Caucasian lives matter or all lives matter, it goes without saying. (well, this is perhaps where the gap of understanding originates in the first place. Some of the Chinese people do not really understand the context and the background)
And in the hypocrisy of a society that labels itself it values all lives, black lives are being terminated so recklessly by law enforcement on a consistent and justified basis. That angers American people.

所以黑人的命也是命，我认为倒是很准确的抓住了英文的原意。黑人的命很重要有点黑命贵的没那么歧视版。。。
